fields.request: Manual QA: Validate Horologia scheduled tasks admin list
fields.request_details:
1. Visit the Horologia Â» Scheduled tasks changelist in the Django admin.
2. Confirm the table shows columns for Name, Enabled, Scheduler, Interval, Last run, and One-off without a Start time column.
3. Verify the Last run column renders timestamps without microseconds using ISO formatting (for example, 2025-01-15T12:00:00-05:00).
4. Use the filters sidebar to confirm Start time still appears and a new Interval type filter lists the available interval periods.
5. Apply the Interval type filter to show tasks with a specific interval period and confirm other tasks disappear until the filter is cleared.
